text: haey anak del sang babakamm min ach ttuolobantouk champoh babakamm robsa anakadtei ban laey . haey brasenbae anak del mean babakamm thngonthngor ampeavneav aoy ke chuoyrek pn babakamm robsa ke ku kmean anaknea ach chuoyrek pn aveimuoy pi ke ban laey tohbei ke chea sach nheate nungoknea kadaoy . tampit anak( mou ham meat) kreante chea anak dasatuen promean champoh banda anak del kaotakhlach mcheasa robsa puokke teang athrkambang ning ban brate b tde sa la t bonnaoh . haey anaknea del ban saamatakhluon( ampi ampeu shi ri k ning ampeuaeakrak) pit brakd nasa ke ban saamat samreab khluon ke phtal bonnaoh . haey tow champoh a l laoh kuchea kanleng vilotralb chongokraoy
